channel.title: Scripts on YAO's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scripts on YAO's Blog

item.title: Bulk RNA-seq (7): From ENSEMBL ID Cleanup to Gene Name Conversion
item.description: Note In the realm of RNA-seq analysis, one often encounters the challenge of working with ENSEMBL IDs that include decimal points, a result of gene versioning in databases.

item.title: Bulk RNA-seq (6): Normalization and PCA Visualization in RNA-seq Data Analysis with DESeq2
item.description: Note In this blog post, we’ll dive into a practical guide on using DESeq2 for differential expression analysis in RNA-seq data.

item.title: Bulk RNA-seq (5): Streamlining Mapping with a Custom Linux Script
item.description: Note To overcome the inconvenience of manually mapping each RNA-seq sample to the reference genome, I’ve developed a Linux shell script.
